name: Odyssey (K-Tek Software)
overview: The journey of your life...or death! Like the explorers of old, your path lies through an uncharted world. A forbidden, inhospitable land ridden with Plague Pests, guarded by the lethal Robo Crabs and defended by a powerful kill, Alien fleet. You stand alone against these Alien evils. your only defense is your trusty, fast-firing laser gun and your raw courage. This is your mission and there is no turning back. For you, survival lies in victory alone. Hav eyou got what it takes to face this lone quest and complete your mission against all odds?
